website_summaries.verdict: InstaMarine’s breathable, securely fitted, and warm dive socks are an excellent deal for keeping your feet safe and warm at the beach or in the water at a reasonable price.
pros: Soft and stretchy neoprene and nylon material
cons: These dive socks are intended for sand and water, so don’t be surprised if they wear out quickly when worn on rough surfaces

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This product works well, I highly recommend them. the bottoms of them stop rocks and plants from cutting my feet. but DO NOT use them outside of the water. sadly I did this on vacation and used them to walk between the trailer and the beach, they work fine on sand but do not fare so well on pavement or cement. the bottoms of mine tore open in a few places and thus I have to buy more next time I go to a lake, however as long as you don't do that, they work well, even with flippers.
customer_reviews.author: Kirain

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Used them with closed fins and they were very comfortable. However, they did have the ability to attract every sharp pointy rock in the area. I do not know if that was a design flaw or if the engineers were just having a bit of fun. Long story short, my wife stole mine and I was forced to buy a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Erusiel

customer_reviews.title: I don't go kayaking without these
customer_reviews.text: Great product and perfect fit. They really help when launching or landing the kayak, especially on a rocky or shell covered beach. They do fill with water pretty easy and get a bit of weight to them but their comfort and protection makes the minor inconvenience worth it. They feel fantastic walking on the deck of a boat, beach, boardwalk, payment, even gravel roads. They do retain a quite a bit of sand so I recommend washing them off outside and not trying to do it in a sink or tub. Update: I had the chance to wear with dive fins and they fit perfectly. They actually made the fins fit much better.
customer_reviews.author: Carrack Spar

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for cheap neoprene socks. If you pay about $10-20 more you can get some that actually conform to your feet closely, these leave a big gap under the arch; which is no issue to me because I'm wearing flippers over these anyhow.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Feet
customer_reviews.text: So far these neoprene socks are great! I like the textured bottom. No problem with seams unraveling. They make fins more comfortable and keep feet warm in cooler water temps. Mine are slightly large; I am a female with size 10 feet; perhaps a medium would be a closer fit... regardless, I am enjoying them
customer_reviews.author: Moonbarker

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and excellent quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and excellent quality product. I use them for diving and they are doing their job perfectly. Also they provide very good protection from the hot sand. These diving socks seem pretty durable to me and they rinse out easily and dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: These were true to size. Bought a pair for myself and my husband to wear under our scuba fins. This product is great to use as it prevents blisters and sores on your feet after prolonged diving. InstaMarine knows how to make great diving products. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: SherriD

customer_reviews.title: Great protection from sharp rocks
customer_reviews.text: We used these for snorkeling in south Kauai. Some of the beaches had some volcanic VERY SHARP rock on them as you went into the water and I can say these protected our feet well. They were easy to pull off in the water to get sand out and put back on, but at the same time held snug so it didn't seem like they'd fall off. We brought them home and plan to use them next time.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these, it literally wore out after 1 use in the pool. The feel is also super sloshy, was not a comfortable fit at all. I feel like there's a pocket of water I'm stepping on. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyH

customer_reviews.title: Very effective in keeping my feet warm!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the soles of these were a bit more tough, but I can't expect that when I wear them around the poolside so much. These wet shoes are comfortable and keep my feet (I have severe nerve damage in them) warm and without nerve pain. I've tried at least 5 swim shoes and these are the best as far as insulating my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 uses when it seemed all great, and seems are comping undone, rendering socks useless . see pics
customer_reviews.text: FIRST IMPRESSION : be great it it had a few draining holes, as the water when it gets inside sits there. However no biggi I just form time to time take em off to get rid of the water. Or better, don't fall into the Ocean as I paddle board. :-) . 6 MONTH LATER: Seems are comping undone and nothing premium about these socks for paddleboarding. Unable to be used. See pictures. I care for my items with ensuring post ocean wash, shade drying and proper storage. I wore these paddle board neoprene socks only 5 times. Not good enough them already being useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie New Zealand

customer_reviews.title: These were a foot saver!
customer_reviews.text: We were snorkeling on Hawaii and needed the foot protection getting in and our of the water over the lava and other rocks. They also helped reduce chaffing due to the flippers.
customer_reviews.author: PDett

customer_reviews.title: I wear a size 12 mens and ordered a large ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 12 mens and ordered a large. They fit perfectly on my foot. Very well made. I don't use these for anything water related but they are very grippy and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiem

customer_reviews.title: They are great at the pool and fit like a second skin
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair purchasing in a short time. They are great at the pool and fit like a second skin. Great inside flippers with strap behind heel.
customer_reviews.author: mary ann

customer_reviews.title: Swim sicks
customer_reviews.text: The soles have worn in a couple of spots on each sock, it could be from the surface of our community pool that has caused the worn out areas. They still keep my feet warm though.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: great protection while in the water
customer_reviews.text: finally something lite to wear on my feet. Works in flippers and protects just plain on you feet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Roland Bessette

customer_reviews.title: Great as a liner
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as a liner for my Crocs water sandals when kayaking. Perfect! Go one size smaller. I usually wear a 9.5 to 10, but went with the 8-9. Snug, but comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom609

customer_reviews.title: Decent booties, unless you get a bad one.
customer_reviews.text: I swim 4 times a week, using these booties in my fins. This is my 4th pair. They are comfortable, and previous pairs had held up OK, lasting 6 to 8 months. This pair is only about 3 weeks old, and a seam has ripped out. I think my wife can sew it up..... I'll probably buy them again, hoping that the next pair will be sound. If they aren't, I'll try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: shroom

customer_reviews.title: Comfy. I wore them while hiking in The Narrows ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy. I wore them while hiking in The Narrows in Utah. They fit comfy inside my hiking shoes. They will not keep your feet dry, they didn’t keep my feet warm either but they did keep me from getting blisters walking miles in the water. I wear size 9 women’s shoe. Ordered the large. Probably could have worn the medium but didn’t want them to be too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are used at least twice weekly when we ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are used at least twice weekly when we do our work-outs in the pool at our health facility. They have met our expectation thus far.
customer_reviews.author: GaryC

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit, flexibility, and durability. It fits well in my swim fins.
customer_reviews.author: Totustuus

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your fins
customer_reviews.text: hI bought these for our beach snorkeling trip. They fit like a glove and were a pleasure to wear. They protected my feet from the rocks and the fins.
customer_reviews.author: J. L

customer_reviews.title: Size is true
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews first and I ordered smaller size, well sending back because size chart is aaccurate,
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Prevents flipper discomfort
customer_reviews.text: After going swimming with new flippers, I found they had rubbed off enough skin to leave an abrasion that took a while to heal. And yet I still wanted to use flippers because of how fast it made me feel in the water. These socks were the perfect solution. They fit me snugly but not too tight. They do cause a little drag if you wear them on their own, but even then it's still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Adaline Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great as Slippers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the water sock for my mother who is partially disabled and cant wear regular socks to walk around. the non slip bottom gives her stability. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ann Oscar-Rambarran

customer_reviews.title: I loved these! Bought them to use under my snorkeling ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved these! Bought them to use under my snorkeling fins. Great to wear in and out of the water and the beach. Also, I have a size 12 foot and the eleven fits just fine. I will buy another pair shortly for me and a pair for my wife!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Such

customer_reviews.title: Dont wear them as shoes.
customer_reviews.text: They were great to wear around the boat on my cruise. We did a beach day in Cozumel and I walked a lot on concrete. I had seen people walk around the water park in them. Dont do this. By the end of the day I had worn holes in the bottom. :( other than my error they were awesome. Fit great and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: April Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Got these because we have a new pool with PebbleTec ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these because we have a new pool with PebbleTec and need top wear socks for first two weeks to not get foot oils on the new interior lining. So, we ordered three pair of these. Within two days, at least one sock from each pair had holes in them. We wear them, but it was rather disappointing. Can't imagine how they would hold up diving.
customer_reviews.author: Shayn R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He liked them. They are lightweight and were comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Rench

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great water 'socks' comfortable easy to put on/take off and works, I ordered these 3 sets because we needed a little protection from the little rocks in our lake and helps keep the feet warm too.
customer_reviews.author: Kl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears these when we go boating and loves them! He says they are much more comfortable than traditional water shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: My husband had these on for about 30 minutes and they had a hole in them from walking around in a pool. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tim othy Houtz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Durable
customer_reviews.text: Kept my feet warmer than expected in 50 degree F water. Also pretty comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING...YOU CANNOT RETURN THESE SOCKS
customer_reviews.text: HONESTLY...IMPOSSIBLE TO RETURN...THEY MAY NOT FIT AND THEN YOU ARE STUCK WITH THEM....
customer_reviews.author: Outside the Pit

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect and did very well with my fins for scuba diving.
customer_reviews.author: Gail F

customer_reviews.title: Not as announced
customer_reviews.text: The sock is too thin to use in areas where there are big stones or rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: but they work fine as stand alone water and beach slippers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go with some swim fins I also purchased around the same time. Didn't need them with the fins , but they work fine as stand alone water and beach slippers. Product arrived in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: bonzo

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and fit perfect. I would recommend these to anyone with foot sensitivity to hot sand or chafing from snorkel fins.
customer_reviews.author: Fifthjoker

customer_reviews.title: Too good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect till the wife asked where hers were on the beach in Cozemel...then I didn't have a pair anymore.
customer_reviews.author: James Bennett

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how they were. Couldn't get my foot in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Harry1946

customer_reviews.title: Did not last!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for beach volleyball. My pair fit well and were comfortable, but got a hole during my second time wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Best water socks I have purchased; they are comfortable and the sizing guide is accuarate; mine fit just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Super soft. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9. Ordered the 8-9. Fits perfectly. Super soft. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Bottom wears out quickly.
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable. But the bottom wears out quickly. Doesn't seal well.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: They split in the seam on first use. Company should very least let me return them or send a new pair....poor quality workmanship
customer_reviews.author: holli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great socks. Good fit and feel to what size I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yesss
customer_reviews.text: Used these for snorkeling and walking through the beaches of Thailand and they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Ok, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Fit fine and look great, not sure how rugged they are, have not used a lot yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable to wear by themselves or inside swim fins.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M.

customer_reviews.title: about what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: they are ok and fit ok on vacation. dont wear them on the street or they will wear out.
customer_reviews.author: k m

customer_reviews.title: Walk in comfort
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I used them as a sock when wearing water shoes. They also keep me from getting blister on my feet when wearing snorkel flippers.
customer_reviews.author: Photoholic

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Used these in the Blue Lagoon in Iceland and they kept me from slipping as I waded in the water. They were perfect and the perfect fit. I wear a 7 and they were snug enough without being too tight.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Socks made wearing swim fins comfortable again. Makes walking on hot pool deck bearable.
customer_reviews.author: eugene jennings

customer_reviews.title: Socked it to me!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and fit well. Don't use around barnacles, or you'll get sliced ankles. But they make hi-cuts for that!
customer_reviews.author: thelare

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking Narrows
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for hiking the Narrows and worked perfectly to keep our feel warm. No blisters either!
customer_reviews.author: Heather V

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, keeps my feet warm
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, keeps my feet warm, which is why I purchased them. Only con is that I only wear them in backyard pool, and bottom of socks are already wearing out and only have had them a month.
customer_reviews.author: cks2cute4U

customer_reviews.title: Wears out quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these for the four days they worked. I wore these on the beach and they were fantastic to keep the hot sand out until they were out on the bottom and got holes. Would not buy again due to the longevity issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brayden Weaver

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I hve been using them for two plus week for an hour each time. They are already worn through. A shame cause they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the need
customer_reviews.text: They fit very well, perfect for the need. Wore them around the resort for a full week, they were ready to be tossed by then.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Froeschner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect answer to how to get to hot tub on frozen deck
customer_reviews.text: Using as socks to walk on snow and ice to get to hot tub and working well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for 3 hours walking around the water park. The heel and toes were worn all the way through! Extremely comfortable until they wore out. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mark johnson

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit
customer_reviews.text: I returned these socks because they did not fit properly. They are a little higher that other socks I have used and did not stretch adequately in order to get my feet into them without a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Bette B

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Looked like they would work great but after just the 2nd use, one of them tore - the seam split open.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B

customer_reviews.title: Holes
customer_reviews.text: Only had them for a couple of months before they developed holes
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and as adertised
customer_reviews.text: I will not actually try these sailing for another week but at least on dry land they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Meagher

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my foot well but loose around the ankle. I need it to be tight around my ankle to keep sand and debris out. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Branden. Wigfield

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with them. Problem was, so was my son. He stole them. I'll be buying another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy D Stanfa

customer_reviews.title: Big holes!
customer_reviews.text: I used these water socks once and got a big hole in both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Marie Gillay

customer_reviews.title: They worked very well inslulating the foot from the fin ...
customer_reviews.text: They worked very well inslulating the foot from the fin preventing further damage to the foot, and allowing it to heal from prior injury!
customer_reviews.author: daniel mansir

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kept my feet warm and dry on a river trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fool me once
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I put them on they ripped so I won’t be buying these again
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: They were sleek looking and kept a decent amount of sand out of my shoes. But they broke the second time I wore them. And I didn’t even do much when I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Athey

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfottable
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable. Boots short or long are better than socks
customer_reviews.author: Repsol91

customer_reviews.title: Begins tearing all at the heel and torn around the toes.  Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for swimming laps in an indoor gym pool.
customer_reviews.author: Chetan

customer_reviews.title: were comfortable, and appear to be durable
customer_reviews.text: Wore these under water shoes during a rafting trip. Helped to prevent chafing, were comfortable, and appear to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ken D

customer_reviews.title: nice water sock
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice padded sole and it fits nicely
customer_reviews.author: John Chappo

customer_reviews.title: We'll see how they work during a dive!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 7 1/2-8. Medium too big, small a little too small. I plan on using the small and if I need more bulk for my fins I'll use both pairs. The med fit over the small so I can wear both if need be. Will update review after I dive with them this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after the first use in a lake, but after speaking with the CEO of the company I found that I was using them incorrectly. This is a great company to buy through as they stand behind their product and will make it right if you are not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Sock is very comfortable. Used to get blisters on my ankles which ...
customer_reviews.text: Sock is very comfortable. Used to get blisters on my ankles which would limit my time out on the water but with the socks, its no longer a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chico

customer_reviews.title: It maybe only good for only the sand
customer_reviews.text: Wore InstaMarine for 2 hours at the waterpark. Wore a huge holes in both feet! It maybe only good for only the sand!
customer_reviews.author: John Ski

product_meta.title: InstaMarine Premium Neoprene Water Fin Sock Perfect for Water Sports, Snorkeling, Diving, Swimming
feature_bullets: InstaMarine Premium Neoprene Socks: With 2.5 mm thickness, this pair of water socks is breathable and is mainly for protecting your feet against rocks and blisters from the swimming fins.
Anti-slip: Applied with small grip pattern on the bottom sole, the water socks has silicone traction to grip the slippery surface like the boat deck, swimming pool, or shore.

Unisex design for Multi-purpose: This pair of neoprene water socks is perfect for various water sports like swimming, diving, snorkeling, paddle boarding, kiteboarding, wakeboarding, kayaking and other sports like beach soccer, beach volleyball.
Comfortable Fit: Super soft, stretchy and breathable material for water and sand sports like: snorkeling, diving, surfing, rafting, kayaking, beach volleyball, beach soccer, etc.
Sand-proof: Quality material and perfect fit, prevent micro sand getting into the socks.
